seo.title: Privacy Policy | Chicago Foods
seo.description: At Chicago Foods, we are committed to providing high-quality corn derivatives. We transform your ideas into products that create value and trust.

header.title: Privacy Policy
header.intro: This website does not collect, store, or share personal information from its users. Our goal is to provide information without the need for registration or personal data.

sections.title: Data We Do Not Collect
content: Name, email, phone number, address, or any other personal data.
Geolocation information or cookies for tracking purposes.

sections.title: External Services
sections.content: Our website uses only external services to enhance user experience, such as font libraries or contact form submissions. These services do not collect personal data directly for us.

sections.title: Security
sections.content: Although we do not collect personal information, we maintain technical measures to ensure the website is secure and functioning correctly.

sections.title: Updates
sections.content: This privacy policy may be updated occasionally. We recommend that users periodically check this page.
